songs.title: By The Bridal
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Here’s a lot [?]
[?] in town[?]
I can see
[?] I came round

[Verse 1]
He’ll have his moment
Thought he was a clown
Scared of anybody
Hear the coffin sound

[Chorus]
[?] To walk the trees
And talk [?] north of Babylon
[?] by the [?]

[Verse 2]
[?]
Here’s a lot [?]
[?] in town
Spirals I can see
Spirals all around

[Verse Three]
[?] had an omen
Wore it like a shroud
Scared of everybody
[?]

[Chorus]
[?] To walk the trees
And talk [?] north of Babylon
[?] by the [?]

[Outro]
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
Beyond
[Fade out]
